@DrGilluley @NHS_ELFT @DrAmarShah @baggybinny 5/5 With ur current system, it seems the options are:
~we have to take days off school/work to be involved (attending a monthly meeting = 12 days leave)
~ur engagement is mostly with people who donâ€™t work/attend school
Or, maybe we generate a range of other options together?

@DrGilluley @NHS_ELFT @DrAmarShah @baggybinny 3/5 Getting back to work is a key indicator of #recovery
